name: Boulder Dash (itch)
description:
One to four players can play BoulderDash. Escape from the giant robotic spider and use your shovel to move boulders out of your way, and throw them at the spider's head. Beat your friends to the top to win the game.

Controls:

Left Stick: Movement

Right Stick: Aim Shovel

Right Trigger Press: Grab Boulders

Right Trigger Release: Throw Boulders

Game by: Zack Harris, Dante Camarena, Jordan Sparks

Made with the OrbIt Engine
